titleStmt.title: A treatise of matters beneficiary by Fra Paolo Sarpi ... ; newly translated out of Italian according to the best and most perfect copy printed at Mirandola, Anno Dom. 1676, wherein is related with the ground of the history, how the almes of the faithful were distributed in the primitive church, the particulars whereof the table sheweth.
Trattato delle materie beneficiarie. English
titleStmt.author: Sarpi, Paolo, 1552-1623.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Thomas Hodgkin, and are to be sold by William Crook ... and Richard Bently ...,

notesStmt.note: Translation of: Trattato delle materie beneficiarie.
Reproduction of original in Cambridge University Library.
